channel.title: Problem with sdwdate
channel.description:
Hello. I have some problems with sdwdate
● sdwdate.service - Secure Distributed Web Date Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/sdwdate.service; enabled; preset: enabled) Active: activating (auto-restart) (Result: core-dump) since Thu 2025-02-27; 3s ago Invocation: 6242d938293f4a918c975dbc10cce343 Docs: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/sdwdate Process: 9338 ExecStart=/usr/libexec/sdwdate/sdwdate (code=dumped, signal=SYS) Main PID: 9338 (code=dumped, signal=SYS) Mem peak: 2.1M CPU: 39ms
+ set -e + true 'INFO /usr/bin/sdwdate-log-viewer: START' + /bin/journalctl --boot --output cat -n 10000 -f _SYSTEMD_UNIT=qubes-sync-time.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=qubes-sync-time.timer + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=timesanitycheck.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=bootclockrandomization.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=sdwdate.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=whonix-firewall.service + SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER=suspend-pre + SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER=suspend-post + SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER=anondate + _AUDIT_TYPE_NAME=SECCOMP Within minimum time 'Tue Nov 5 00:00:00 UTC 2024' and expiration timestamp 'Tue May 17 10:00:00 UTC 2033', ok. Boot Clock Randomization https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Boot_Clock_Randomization + 104 185583560 Changed time from .... (1740642543.533538103) to .... (1740642647.205970400).

item.title: Problem with sdwdate
item.dc:creator: sam
item.description:
Hello. I have some problems with sdwdate

● sdwdate.service - Secure Distributed Web Date
Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/sdwdate.service; enabled; preset: enabled)
Active: activating (auto-restart) (Result: core-dump) since Thu 2025-02-27; 3s ago
Invocation: 6242d938293f4a918c975dbc10cce343
Docs: sdwdate: Secure Distributed Web Date
Process: 9338 ExecStart=/usr/libexec/sdwdate/sdwdate (code=dumped, signal=SYS)
Main PID: 9338 (code=dumped, signal=SYS)
Mem peak: 2.1M
CPU: 39ms

  • set -e
  • true ‘INFO /usr/bin/sdwdate-log-viewer: START’
  • /bin/journalctl --boot --output cat -n 10000 -f _SYSTEMD_UNIT=qubes-sync-time.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=qubes-sync-time.timer + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=timesanitycheck.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=bootclockrandomization.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=sdwdate.service + _SYSTEMD_UNIT=whonix-firewall.service + SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER=suspend-pre + SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER=suspend-post + SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER=anondate + _AUDIT_TYPE_NAME=SECCOMP
    Within minimum time ‘Tue Nov 5 00:00:00 UTC 2024’ and expiration timestamp ‘Tue May 17 10:00:00 UTC 2033’, ok.
    Boot Clock Randomization
    Boot Clock Randomization - Kicksecure
  • 104 185583560
    Changed time from … (1740642543.533538103)
    to … (1740642647.205970400).

Read full topic
